abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Poison Strike
abilities.description: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) poison damage.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:
* Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray
* 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave
* 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, beast sense, spike growth
* 3rd level (3 slots): plant growth, water walk

abilities.name: Standing Leap.
abilities.description: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage.
abilities.description: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.
